answerText: Raney nickel [prompt on nickel][10] Nickel is complexed with these molecules in the Mond process. Isoelectronic with nitrogen gas, its toxicity is due to an irreversible binding to hemoglobin.
heading: DEES |2014 | Toronto-Waterloo-McMaster A | 17 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The most well-known application of this catalyst is in the Mozingo reaction, where it is used to remove a thioketal from the alkane product.  [10] Name this grey powdered catalyst that is derived from an alloy of aluminium and its namesake metal.
